title: @Riot: Fix Kayn's vocals in replay/spectator?
body: It's kinda jarring that in spectator/replays Kayn will _always_ use his base vocals even when he's already transformed.

replies.body: I just sent this over to the sound designer that worked on Kayne, and he sent it over to the engineer that worked on him, so  a fix is incoming! Thanks for the report :D

> [{quoted}](name=Raxistaicho,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=tjtmdTPk,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2018-01-12T17:34:34.826+0000)
>
> Any news on this one? :)

There's an engineer working on getting it fixed! I don't think it's a super simple fix, so it might not be next patch, but it'll be coming! Thanks for checking up :p
